main event: Civilians reported sighting four flaming balls in the sky over Colorado Springs for approximately 10 to 12 seconds.
interesting points: The objects were initially traveling in a straight line before they seemed to lose altitude and disappear., Observers felt the objects resembled balloons with flares attached., A wife and husband duo observed a strange light to the north that changed in size and position for about one and a half hours., Multiple light sources were observed, appearing hazy at times due to cloud cover., Police and local authorities received reports but found no additional sightings at that time.
sighted object: four flaming balls in the sky
